sourceDesc.p: Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/005/0053

front.p: 1880 November 17: to Hector Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/005/0053

body.p: I have the honour to inform you that I have been instructed by our Council to apply to you for a copy of each of the more recently published works of your Department.—

I may add, that I noticed this day, on the table of the Athenæum here, three Geological Reports for the years 1877, 1878, & 1879, (2 copies of each,) none of which have been received by our Society: a copy of each of these three Reports would therefore be very acceptable to us.—
